name: Lido Finance
description_who: LDO tokenholders own and govern the protocol. They currently take a cut of the total return on investment (protocol revenue). Lidoâ€™s investors include ParaFi Capital, Bitscale Capital, KR1, etc.
description_how: Stakers deposit funds into Lido and receive a return on investment in the form of staking rewards (supply-side revenue).
description_what: Lido is a non-custodial staking protocol built on Ethereum and other blockchains. Lido was founded by a pseudo-anonymous team and launched in 2020.
